title: Lost and Found
description: Olivia Porter's life drastically changes in the blink of an eye when she and her family are in a car wreck while on vacation leaving her the only survivor. Unable to move back to her hometown she moves in with her sister in law who forcefully pulls her out of her depression. Her life once again changes when she meets multimillionaire Cash Kingston who is a widower and father of two children that are craving for love and attention that he can't seem to give them due to his own grief that he can't seem to get over. Olivia decides to take a job as his nanny because her heart goes out to his children but what happens when she gets to know him better after she takes the job isn't what she was expecting at all.
author: Jennifer Bryan Yarbrough
